Font Chef Table cmap

cmap subtable 0
platformID	0
encodingID	3
format	4
language	0
0x0000	null	\#1
0x000D	CR	\#2
0x0020	space	\#3
0x0021	exclam	\#4
0x0022	quotedbl	\#5
0x0023	numbersign	\#6
0x0041	A
0x0042	B
0x0061	a
0x0062	b
end subtable
